name: Beater Spirit
description: BS is the game where you make your own rules. Create the match of any size and complexity and get the reward for completing it ! Try to get all the costumes and weapons skins from the random store.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio

reviews.review_text: This 'game' has awful collisions, the sound effects are very bad (like chicken would clock when pressing buttons, unrelated menu sounds).. uninstalled this waste of time.
